text:
## Overview

The following is an overview of features planned for Weaviate. By clicking the link, you can upvote the feature or engage in a discussion about it. You can also join our forum to discuss the roadmap in more detail.

We use your feedback and votes on GitHub pages to plan future releases.
If you find any of the issues of interest, follow the link and upvote  it on GitHub.

Please feel free to engage with us about the roadmap on Weaviate's GitHub or on the forum.
